reviewText: Sounds like listening to myself minus the profanity, and I am a Minister of the Bible.  Another big exception is he is completely and throughly wrong about the Bible being irrelevant.  The Bible tells the true stories extant throughout human history fraught with the Presence of GOD in the World, and HE who MADE IT!  But his criticisms of Religion are accurate and is the very feeling I get form reading the Gospels.  Jesus would be chagrined by what is being passed off as Religion.  Basically the Churches have become the modern version of the Medicine Shows of the 19th Century and Vaudeville of the late 19th and early 20th.  And the greatest sin is conformity and going along to get along!
summary: Sounds like listening to myself minus the profanity
Title: The Comedy Jesus Show

reviewText: Hilarious.  A must see for any lover of Jesus or comedy.  Just about a 30 min. set with a funny old psa about obscenity that runs after the credits.
summary: A must see for any Jesus or comedy lover:
Title: The Comedy Jesus Show

reviewText: Long prerecorded video clips and super-long credits at the end do not add up to stand-up comedy. This is a joke worth flushing down the toilet.
Title: The Comedy Jesus Show

reviewText: I did not order this, or get this from you. I had no desire to see if at this time.
summary: I did not order nor receive
Title: The Comedy Jesus Show

reviewText: It just was not funny. It was as preachy and shrill as the preachers he claims to hate. I'm a fan of comedians that can skewer religious hypocrisy. Bill Maher can do it well, this guy can't. He's not a good stand up or a good lecturer.And the film is too short to be a film. It's barely a 20 minute routine, plus a 1 minute clip at the start.
Title: The Comedy Jesus Show
